short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Harness the power of sharing your availability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Blocks copies and pastes your availability. By connecting with your Free Blocks account - which in turn can connect with a range of external data sources - we create a simple bulleted list of times you're free, so you can share with the right audience at the right time.
